Package org.smslib.modem

Classes related to serial and IP GSM modems.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AModemDriver Abstract implementation of a generic GSM modem driver.
CNMIDetector Small detector for a CNMI-AT-Command.
IPModemGateway Gateway representing a GSM Modem or Phone connected via an IP port.
ModemGateway Class representing GSM modems or phones.
SerialModemGateway Gateway representing a GSM Modem or Phone connected via a serial port.
 

Enum Summary
ModemGateway.IPProtocols  
ModemGateway.ModemTypes Class representing different types of GSM modems / phones.
 

Package org.smslib.modem Description

Classes related to serial and IP GSM modems.
